nodes.text: The Derra Outpost was a Jedi outpost located on Derra during the High Republic Era. Around 231 BBY. the Marshal of the outpost was Jedi Master Tera Sinube. Derra was relatively close to the Mid Rim planet Cyclor, so when the Nihil attacked the Cyclor Shipyards, the outpost's Jedi were asked to assist in the Shipyards' defense. Sinube sent a Drift of Jedi Vectors headed by Master Porter Engle.
The Derra Jedi outpost was first mentioned in the 2021 novel The High Republic: The Rising Storm.
